item.title: Shepherd in Raichur struck by lightning dies on way to hospital
item.description:
<![CDATA[Shepherd in Raichur struck by lightning dies on way to hospital
Vartha Bharati | 09-04-2025 | 16:52:00 IST
Representational Image (file photo)
Raichur: In an incident that occurred on the outskirts of Ankushadoddi village in Maski taluk, a 32-year-old shepherd was struck dead by lightning on Tuesday evening.
The deceased has been identified as Ramanna Nayak, who was a resident of Ankushadoddi.
Nayaka had gone to graze sheep on the outskirts of the village and was returning in the evening,...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
